plot: Susan, a dying American woman travels to Mexico City searching for a healer. Instead she finds Ariel, a psychic card reader who uncovers one of her tightly held secrets.
title: La lectura
plot_es: Susan, a dying American woman travels to Mexico City searching for a healer. Instead she finds Ariel, a psychic card reader who uncovers one of her tightly held secrets.
plot_en: Susan, a dying American woman travels to Mexico City searching for a healer. Instead she finds Ariel, a psychic card reader who uncovers one of her tightly held secrets.
